2.post_text: Revealed - the new #GTC4LussoT with an 8-cylinder turbo engine to be presented at the Paris Motor Show. gtc4lussot.ferrari.com

comments.message: Gabriele Gianello e Arianna Carraro se mettete su famiglia, questa macchina è perfetta ;-)

sinceramente non condivido la scelta della Ferrari di snaturare la Gtc4Lusso, privandola del motore V12 a favore del V8 Turbo, credo che sia anche una scelta sbagliata di marketing, perché se avessi la possibilità non comprerei più il V12 ma il V8T visto che nelle nostre città e sulle autostrade la potenza del V12 è superflua. la Ferrari ha sempre avuto la sua ammiraglia 4 posti con motori V12 e non capisco perchè cambiare strada. Credo che prima o poi arriverà anche un Suv, anche se per il momento è stasto smentito, come era stato smentito l'arrivo del turbo sui modelli con V12. la nuova gestione del Cavallino Rampante lo sta privando del suo prestigio avvicinandosi alle auto borghesi.

Matilde la prossima volta cerco di procurarmene una così ...nella speranza che sia di tuo gradimento e che non derida anche questa
😒😒😒 #lamiaUnocièrimastamale
#iopiùdilei #insensibile #prayforFiatUno
(Symone Aldo Chiara)

Una automobile il cui nome contiene la parola "lusso" che è stata privata del tradizionale ed eccellete V12 in favore di un V8 (pregevolissimo, ma pur sempre un V8) con una potenza inferiore al modello aspirato fa tanto "vorrei ma non posso" che mal si sposa con l'ostentato concetto di "lusso".

Si può ipotizzare che i consumi del V8T siano sensibilmente inferiori; questo aiuterà i possessori di queste utilitarie a tirare a campare fino a fine mese, senza dover saltare i pasti.
In questa ottica sarebbe stato più sensato chiamarla GT4ECOT, probabilmente sarebbe stato più efficace anche a livello di marketing... e meno di cattivo gusto.
Fossi in voi a questo punto prenderei in considerazione una versione Bi Fuel, magari a metano o GPL...
Big mistake !!! Ferrari isn't Porsche or Mercedes!!!!
Martin Lafond-Thenaille bah voila un lancement dommage c du downsizing goddamite ✊🏼
Please go back to the v12
Per andare a fare la spesa è l'ideale, solo il colore non mi piace, per me la Ferrari deve essere rossa, posso concedere il giallo, ma niente più.

السلام عليكم
فيه مجموعة من الناس أعرفهم مسخرين جزء كبير جدا من حياتهم لعمل الخير وخدمة الناس ! منهم مجموعة من أصدقائي أطباء القلب
تواصل معي أحدهم بالأمس ، وطلب مني أعمل الإعلان ده :
لو أي حد يعرف مريض قلب (من غير القادرين) محتاج عمليات (قسطره ، أو دعامات ، أو تركيب منظمات القلب الصناعية ، أو جراحه قلب مفتوح ، أو قلب مفتوح أطفال ، أو قسطره أطفال) سيتم استقبال الحالات وعمل اللازم لها كاملا وبالمجان لغير القادرين إن شاء الله تعالى ، وبدون قوائم انتظار ! بل وكمان فيه خبراء أجانب بيترددوا على المبرة بشكل دوري للحالات الحرجة ! خير كبير جدا والله العظيم !
فقط عليك أن تذهب إلى مستشفي مبره مصر القديمه ، وِحده قسطره و جراحات القلب أمام محطه مترو الملك الصالح ، امتداد شارع صلاح سالم امام نفق الملك الصالح
يروح كل يوم صباحا في عيادة القلب ، والخميس في عيادة جراحة القلب ويسأل على أحد الأطباء الأفاضل :
د.محمد صبري أو د.أحمد السواح أو د.أحمد علي
برجاء النشر ، الدال على الخير كفاعله ..
وعلى الجانب الآخر ، اللي عاوز يشارك في الخير العظيم ده ممكن برضه يروح المبرة ويسأل على الدكاترة دول وهم هايدلوه يعمل ايه ، فيه في المستشفى تبرع (عيني) مشروط ، عشان اللي خايف على فلوسه - ممكن يتبرع (بجهاز أو دعامة أو منظم أو أدوية) على طول - أحسن وأضمن ، وأنا بفضل الطريقة دي أكتر !
اللي عاوز يشارك ممكن يتواصل مع الدكتور أحمد السواح هايوجهكم لأنسب وأأمن وأسرع طريقة للتبرع للحالات دي ازاي
د.أحمد السواح : 01005719820
حالات القلب دي ميزتها إنك فعليا بتنقذ حياة بني آدم !
بيدخل تعبان وهيموت - بيتركب له دعامة أو منظم فايرجع سليم تاني ويمارس حياته بشكل طبيعي ! قال الله تعالى (ومن أحياها فكأنما أحيى الناس جميعا) !
تقبل الله منا ومنكم ..

It looks like a last min. idea. probably forgot about it... I think it would have looked nicer if the mirror was built in the front fenders.... They make the video seem like the mirrors are sleek looking, but I'm guess in person they look ugly.....
Ferrari Have guys ever thought of giving away a Ferrari ? ;) As normally people give away stuff like phones, hardware etc... You guys will make history by giving away a car.

...il trionfo del design...un'opera d'arte!...almeno questo riuscite a capirlo voi che criticate sempre l'ammirazione per le supercars?...ci sarà un motivo se spesso queste auto le ritroviamo nei musei più famosi del mondo!!!

😔

Ethan Melvin David Isabelle Luke Orion Shaw this car is amazing, it's gorgeous, it's powerful, and it's a radical successor to the Enzo Ferrari, but I'm still debating whether it is worth the 2.5-4 million dollar price tag
For the money. I'd go for the CGT. V10, Manual Transmission. Yes the lafferrari is nice, but it's time that Ferrari bring back the manuals
I'd love a car like that, but the condition of the roads around here would absolutely destroy it. I've bottomed out in my Hyundai going over some bumps here. That wouldn't stand a chance.

Meh....Great car, great sound, but perhaps it should've been called LaRodenberry...seems one of Gene Roddenberry's graphic artists had input on this car....Definitely a masterpiece in its own right, but is it really a Ferrari, or THE Ferrari as the name suggests ? Seems to me that Ferrari is losing its identity - with a long list of things being overlooked and left out such as the transmission options, the names and now the looks...what's next ? An AWD ? Oh wait ! That just happened ! Will the Agnelli & Ferrari families please go back and read the recipe that includes tradition, heritage, history and ethos....Yes we make pizzas with all sorts of toppings and ingredients these days to suit everyone's taste, but I'm a traditionalist, I like mine as it was meant to be, deliciously simple, pure, exquisite and with a red base of course 😊
This in my opinion has got to be the most beautiful Ferrari ever made. LaFerrari!

That is one thing that is on my bucket list is drive a ferrari to its limits.

Am I the only one who believes the 458 Italia actually had a sleeker design than the 488 GTB? I understand the reasoning for the more aggressive body styling of the 488 GTB, but I feel like the extra vents and intakes look like poking holes in solid look of the 458 Italia. The front fascia of the 458 Italia had the passive adjustment aero "mustaches" I felt gave the car extra character, not to mention functionality.

Still, I'm jealous of all those who have had the chance to drive this car, and basically any other Ferrari, haha.
